content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a crafting_table, I need to craft some planks. For this I need to place 1 wood block in the crafting table. I have dark_oak_log at slot 41, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: I have now crafted dark_oak_planks at slot 0, which I need to move to an inventory slot. I will move it to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a crafting table I need to place four planks of the same type in a square shape in the crafting grid. I have four dark oak planks in my inventory (at slot 11), so I will start by moving one of them to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: Next I need to place a plank to the right of the first plank, so I will move another dark oak plank from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place a plank below the first plank, so I will move an acacia plank from slot 38 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: The last plank needs to go to the right of the plank below the first plank, so I will move the last acacia plank from slot 38 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 52, "index": 16}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 56, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 14, "index": 36}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 39}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 35, "index": 44}]
thought: The crafting table has been crafted and is now in the craft slot (slot 0). I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
